content:
We have updated the Formulary IG to v1.0.1 with some technical corrections to the STU1 (1.0.0) IG and plan to use this at the connectathon.
The Reference client, server, and data generation tools have also been updated.

Saul Kravitz said:

We have updated the Formulary IG to v1.0.1 with some technical corrections to the STU1 (1.0.0) IG and plan to use this at the connectathon.
The Reference client, server, and data generation tools have also been updated.

Thanks Saul for the update. Do you have the list of changes made?
I see the Jira ticket#FHIR-28494 has been addressed. Any other changes?
https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28494

• The 'D' -> 'd' change is the key one.
  • There is an example of the DrugAlternatives extension that was missing from the 1.0.0 (see https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-formulary/MedicationKnowledge-FormularyDrugV3001.html)
  • There was an issue with the way the extensions were defined that bothered some validators that has been changed.
  • The IG has been rebuilt using FSH for future maintainability

Other than the 'D'->'d' there should be no impact on existing data or implementations.
@Dave Hill

I had a look at the latest 1.0.1 draft and unfortunately there is a new bad error: the CapabilityStatement.url has gone from http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-drug-formulary/CapabilityStatement/usdf-server to http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-drug-formularyCapabilityStatement/usdf-server (missing a slash). I've opened https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29936 for it and I think this needs to be fixed before 1.0.1 can be published.

And one more: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29937
This one is for an invalid searchParam.definition for List-identifier in the CapabilityStatement.
